sources.title: American Violence (THRILLER with DENISE RICHARDS German movies complete, crime drama in full length)
American Violence | Full Movie | Crime Drama | Kaiwi Lyman
sources.description:
American Violence - Fascinated by the causes of violence, Dr. Amanda Tyler, interviews and analyzes death row inmate Jack Shea. As the interview begins, and Jack's fate hangs in the balance, Amanda must decide if a stay of execution should be granted.
2017.  Stars: Kaiwi Lyman, Bruce Dern, Denise Richards

metadata.Plot: Fascinated by the root causes of violent behavior, world renowned psychologist Dr. Amanda Tyler has an opportunity to interview and analyze death row inmate Jackson Shea. As the interview commences, and Jack's fate hangs in the balance, Amanda must determine whether or not a stay of execution should be granted.
metadata.Actors: Kaiwi Lyman, Bruce Dern, Denise Richards
